# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability within this extension, please send an email to [your-email@example.com]. All security vulnerabilities will be promptly addressed.

Please include the following information:

- Type of vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

## Security Best Practices

This extension:

- Does not collect or transmit any user data
- Does not make network requests
- Only modifies files when explicitly requested by the user
- Runs entirely locally within VS Code

## Dependencies

We regularly update dependencies to patch security vulnerabilities. Security updates are prioritized and released as patch versions.
